cause.description:
HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT YOU CAN HELP PEOPLE WITH LEUKEMIA AND LYMPHOMA TO FIGHT THEIR BATTLE AGAINST BLOOD CANCER? THIS IS YOUR CHANCE.
MAKE A DONATION, AS LITTLE AS YOU WANT, AS GENEROUS AS YOU CAN, TO THE TEAM IN TRAINING PROGRAM FUNDRAISING FOR THE LEUKEMIA AND LYMPHOMA SOCIETY, THROUGH ANGELA CAMACHO-DURAN, 1175 BOYLSTON ST, APT.11.
YOU CAN DONATE BY CASH, CHECK OR ONLINE. IF YOU WANT TO LEARN MORE, VISIT MY WEBSITE: www.active.com/donate/tntma/tntmaACamach
AND PLEASE HELP ME SPREAD THE WORD. YOU CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE NOW!! (DEADLINE 8/30/07).
1. February of 2004 my mother was diagnosed with Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma.
2. I want to contribute with the most I can to give hope for those who are battling blood cancers and to remember those who have lost their battle.
3. I have set a personal goal to raise at least US$3900 for my Nike Half-Marathon and 75% of every dollar spent at the Society goes to research, patient services and education.
cause.name: Sports can make a difference!
